author: PFCal-dev
body:
#### PR description:
- Add e/gamma identification BDT and e/gamma energy corrections for the V10 and V11 geometries (@cerminar )
- Implement module sums of unselected trigger cells in the concentrator (@echapon )

Depends on external cms-data/L1Trigger-L1THGCal#18

#### PR validation:

Standard tests with different worflows have been run:
```
 runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 20034.0 --maxSteps=2
 runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 20434.0 --maxSteps=2
 runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 22034.0 --maxSteps=2
 runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 22434.0 --maxSteps=2
 runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 27034.0 --maxSteps=2
```
Physics performance studies have also been done.
title: [HGC trigger] V10/V11 e/g ID + calibration and concentrator module sums
